mapper.select: SELECT lo.id, lo.order_no, lo.user_id, lo.user_name, lo.status, lo.total_amount, lo.paid_amount, lo.lease_start_time, lo.lease_end_time, lo.deposit_amount, lo.complete_time, lo.remark, lo.create_time, lo.update_time FROM lease_order lo WHERE lo.id = #{orderId} AND lo.is_deleted = '0'
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM lease_order WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND is_deleted = '0' GROUP BY status
